rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 21 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 9:40 PM, 07 June 2025(Saturday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales, Bataan, Tarlac, Batangas and Quezon within the next 2 hours.



Heavy to intense rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are being experienced in Metro Manila(Muntinlupa, Las Pinas, Paranaque, Taguig, Quezon City, Caloocan), Bulacan(Santa Maria, San Rafael, San Ildefonso, San Miguel, Baliuag, Bustos, Angat, Pandi, Dona Remedios Trinidad), Rizal(Binangonan, Angono, Taytay, San Mateo, Rodriguez, Antipolo, Baras), Pampanga(San Luis, Candaba, San Simon, Arayat), Nueva Ecija(San Isidro, Cabiao, Gapan, San Antonio, Bongabon, Pantabangan), Laguna(Calamba, Cabuyao, Los Banos, San Pedro) and Cavite(Bacoor, Imus, Dasmarinas, Gen. Mariano Alvarez, Carmona) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
